Subsection.Text: The council shall elect to 1-year terms a chair and a vice chair. No person shall serve more than two consecutive terms in either office.

The council shall meet at the call of the chair, at the request of a majority of its membership, at the request of the department, or at such times as may be prescribed by its rules, and a majority of the council shall constitute a quorum.
Members of the council shall serve without compensation but shall be entitled to be reimbursed for per diem and travel expenses as provided by s. 112.061.
The council may adopt a seal for its use containing the words “Firefighters Employment, Standards, and Training Council.”
